cn.title: 比特派钱包将支持 EOS CAFE DAC 空投

message.data: 比特派钱包将支持EOS CAFE DAC项目代币BEAN的空投。

EOS CAFE DOC (BEAN) 项目空投信息
快照时间: 2018年12月25日 08：00（UTC+8）
空投时间: 2018年12月31日
空投比例: 1 EOS : 1 BEAN
发行总量: 100亿
官网: https://www.eos.cafe/

关于 账户里EOS数量，该项目的规则为:
- 快照时余额大于100EOS的钱包账户无需进行任何操作;
- 余额小于100EOS的账户需要通过Airgrab获取空投 (关注他们的电报 https://t.me/eoscafe) 或者把自己的EOS 提前充值到派银行中，待其项目完成后，我们会尽快将BEAN发放至比特派银行的EOS持币用户账户中。
感谢您对比特派的大力支持。

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: Bitpie Wallet will support EOS CAFE DAC Airdrop

message.data: Bitpie Wallet will support EOS CAFE DAC BEAN Airdrop.

EOS CAFE DAC (BEAN) Project Airdrop Information
Date of Snapshot: December 25, 2018 08:00 (UTC+8)
Date of Airdrop: December 31, 2018
Airdrop Ratio: 1 EOS: 1 BEAN
Total Issuance: 10 Billion
Official website: https://www.eos.cafe/

Regarding the quantity of EOS in the account, the rules of the airdrop are:
- If your account balance is greater than 100EOS when snapshot is happening, no operation is needed. Tokens will be directly transferred to your account.
- If the balance is less than 100EOS you have two options: get them by Airgrab (Telegram for further details: https://t.me/eoscafe) or deposit your EOS on your Bitpie Pie Bank EOS account in advance. After the Airdrop Project is completed we will transfer the BEAN tokens to your Bitpie Pie Bank EOS account as soon as possible.

Find us on
Telegram：t.me/BitpieInternational
Twitter：twitter.com/BitpieWallet
Medium: https://medium.com/@Bitpie
